displaytitle: St. Michael and Standard in Cheapside, after drawing by Antonius van den Wyngaerde in the Bodleain Library
creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed:
in graphite, center left: St. Michael | Bow [crossed out]
in graphite, center: Standard | in Cheapside
signed: Inscribed, signed, and dated in ink and graphite, lower right: These sketches I copied in the Bodleian Library | from the original drawing by Wyngaerde | & named the churches from old plans | & maps before the fire in 1666 | G.Hayter | July 1 1851

titles.title: Album containing 99 original drawings and 87 architecture, portrait, and costume studies of a documentary nature for the paintings Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross and The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer.
St. Michael and Standard in Cheapside, after drawing by Antonius van den Wyngaerde in the Bodleain Library
